category.name: Product Structure.Design Context Clearance Integration
category.category_description: Defines preferences for clearance proxies in a site

preference.name: RDVClearanceProxyServers
preference.preference_description: Specifies the database connection used by the clearance proxy server to connect to the clearance database. Valid Values: DATASOURCE=System-running-clearanceDB-proxy: Port-for-clearanceDB-proxy-server:CONNECT_DATA=Oracle-connection-name:FILTER_NAME=blank An example value is cleardb:7206:CLDB:xyzFilter.
